whatsapp.title: How to share a chat from WhatsApp

android_steps.title: Install the application
android_steps.description: Make sure you have this app installed on your device

android_steps.title: Open your WhatsApp chat
android_steps.description: Go to the group or conversation you want to analyze

android_steps.title: Access the menu
android_steps.description: Tap the three dots in the upper right corner

android_steps.title: Select 'More'
android_steps.description: Look for and select the 'More' option in the dropdown menu

android_steps.title: Export the chat
android_steps.description: Select 'Export chat' from the available options

android_steps.title: Share with this app
android_steps.description: Choose this application from the list of options to share

ios_steps.title: Open your WhatsApp chat
ios_steps.description: Go to the group or conversation you want to export

ios_steps.title: Tap the chat name
ios_steps.description: At the top of the chat, tap the name to view details

ios_steps.title: Scroll to the bottom
ios_steps.description: In the chat information, scroll to the end of the screen

ios_steps.title: Export the chat
ios_steps.description: Tap 'Export chat' from the available options

ios_steps.title: Select Without Media
ios_steps.description: Choose the 'Without Media' option to export only the messages

ios_steps.title: Save to files
ios_steps.description: Tap 'Save to Files' to save on your iPhone

ios_steps.title: Save locally
ios_steps.description: Select 'On my iPhone' and tap save

ios_steps.title: Open our website
ios_steps.description: Open this website and select the saved file

desktop_steps.title: Open WhatsApp on your device
desktop_steps.description: Open the WhatsApp application on your mobile device (Android or iOS)

desktop_steps.title: Extract the chat
desktop_steps.description: Follow the export instructions according to your device (select the Android or iOS tab)

desktop_steps.title: Send the file by email
desktop_steps.description: Select 'Share' or 'Send by email' and send the file to yourself

desktop_steps.title: Access your email on PC
desktop_steps.description: On your computer (PC or Mac), open your email and look for the message with the chat

desktop_steps.title: Download the file
desktop_steps.description: Download the .txt attachment to your computer. Remember where you save it

desktop_steps.title: Visit ChatSalsa
desktop_steps.description: Open ChatSalsa in your computer's browser (the page you're on now)

desktop_steps.title: Upload the file
desktop_steps.description: Click on 'Upload file' and select the downloaded .zip chat file

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our service.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about ChatSalsa is here. If you can't find your answer, contact us!
faq.section_description: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about ChatSalsa. Click on any question to see the complete answer.

questions.question: How does WhatsApp conversation analysis work?
questions.answer: Our service analyzes your WhatsApp chats after exporting them as a ZIP file. We use advanced data analysis techniques and AI to provide you with detailed insights about your conversations, including communication patterns, psychological analysis, and detailed statistics.

questions.question: Is it safe to upload my chats?
questions.answer: Yes, privacy is our priority. Your personal chat data never leaves your device. Statistical analysis is performed 100% on your device. For psychological analysis, chats are anonymized and fragmented on your device before being sent to Microsoft Azure. We only send a fragment of around 20-50k characters. We send chats without personal data. You can review our privacy policy for more details. If you still prefer that no data leaves your device, you can choose the 'no psychological analysis' option when uploading the file.

questions.question: What type of analysis does the platform offer?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive analysis that includes: detailed conversation statistics, communication patterns, schedule and activity analysis, emoji usage and most frequent words, analysis of started and ended conversations, and optional psychological analysis generated by AI. All analyses are presented in a visual and interactive way.

questions.question: How can I export my WhatsApp chats?
questions.answer: In WhatsApp, go to a chat, select 'Export chat' and save as a ZIP file without media. The platform accepts WhatsApp ZIP files from both Android and iOS, and automatically detects the format. You can upload the file directly to our platform.

questions.question: How much does the service cost?
questions.answer: We offer different plans: a free plan with basic analysis and premium plans with more detailed analysis, higher usage frequency, and advanced features. All plans include the option to skip AI psychological analysis if you prefer.

questions.question: Can I use the service on any device?
questions.answer: Yes, our platform is completely web-based and responsive. You can access it from any device (computers, tablets, and mobile phones) and the analyses automatically adapt to your screen. You can also easily share results with others.

help_section.title: Can't find your answer?
help_section.description: If you have a question that's not on this list, don't hesitate to contact us. Our team will be happy to help you.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: These terms set out the conditions under which you may use our WhatsApp conversation analysis service.
terms.section_description: Please read these terms carefully before using our service. By using ChatSalsa, you agree to be bound by these terms.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using our WhatsApp conversation analysis service, you accept these terms of service in their entirety. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use our service.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
sections.content: We provide a web platform that allows users to upload and analyze WhatsApp conversations exported as ZIP files, offering various insights and statistical and AI analysis.

sections.title: 3. Service Use
items: You must be at least 18 years old to use our service.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
You agree not to use the service for illegal or unauthorized activities.

sections.title: 4. Privacy and Data
sections.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Files you upload are processed temporarily and automatically deleted after analysis. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: All content, features and functionality of our service are our property and are protected by copyright, trademarks and other intellectual property laws.

sections.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Our service is provided "as is", without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of our service.

sections.title: 7. Service Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time, with or without notice. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuation of the service.

sections.title: 8. Plans and Subscriptions
sections.content: We offer free and paid plans. The specific terms of each plan, including pricing, features and usage limits, are detailed on our plans page.

sections.title: 9. Termination
sections.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these terms.

sections.title: 10. Applicable Law
sections.content: These terms shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

sections.title: 11. Contact
sections.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.

important_notice.title: Important Notice
important_notice.description: By continuing to use our service, you accept these terms of service. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to

content.text: At ChatSalsa, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our WhatsApp conversation analysis service.

We collect registration information (name, email) when you create an account, and temporarily process the content of WhatsApp conversations you upload for analysis. We also collect usage information and technical data to improve our service.
We use your information to provide and improve our service, process payments, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information. Conversations are encrypted during transmission and storage, and are automatically deleted after analysis.
We retain your account information as long as you maintain an active account. Uploaded conversations are deleted after analysis, typically within 24 hours.

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to processing or request data portability. To exercise these rights, contact us at support@chatsalsa.com.
We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes through a visible notice on our website or by email.
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@chatsalsa.com.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This cookie policy explains what cookies are and how we use them. You should read this policy to understand what type of cookies we use, what information we collect, and how we use it.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These are essential for you to browse the website and use its features.

preferences.title: Preference cookies
preferences.description: Allow the website to remember information that changes how the website behaves or looks.

statistics.title: Statistics cookies
statistics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.

session.title: Session cookies
session.description: These are deleted when you close your browser.

persistent.title: Persistent cookies
persistent.description: These remain on your device for a specified period of time.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.fbp: Used by Facebook to display relevant advertisements

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-party services
thirdPartyServices.description: We use third-party services that may set cookies on your device:
thirdPartyServices.googleAnalytics: We use Google Analytics to analyze website usage. Google Analytics generates statistical information about website usage through cookies.
thirdPartyServices.facebookPixel: We use Facebook Pixel to measure the effectiveness of our advertisements and to personalize advertising content.

howToManage.title: How to manage cookies
howToManage.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this cookie policy.

updates.title: Policy updates
updates.description: We may update this cookie policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, you can contact us at:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Information about how we use cookies on our website to improve your browsing experience.
cookies.section_description: Learn about what cookies we use, what we use them for, and how you can manage your preferences.

what_are_cookies.title: What are cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These cookies help us improve your browsing experience and provide you with a more personalized service.

strictly_necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
strictly_necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include:
items: Firebase Auth: User authentication and session management
Stripe: Secure payment processing and fraud prevention
Workbox PWA: Progressive web app functionality and offline cache
Consent cookies: Remember your cookie preferences

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Used to understand how you interact with our website. They include:
items: Google Analytics (GTM): Usage and behavior statistics
Microsoft Clarity: Behavior analysis and heat maps (if enabled)
Internal metrics: To improve the chat analysis service

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: Used to personalize advertising and measure its effectiveness. They include:
items: Google Ads: Personalized advertising and remarketing
Facebook Pixel: Conversion tracking and custom audiences
TikTok Pixel: TikTok Ads conversion tracking

functionality.title: Functionality cookies
functionality.description: Allow us to remember your settings to offer you a personalized experience. They include:
items: Language preferences: Remember your selected language
Interface settings: Theme, layout and display preferences
User data: Non-sensitive information to personalize the experience

specific_cookies.title: Specific cookies we use
specific_cookies.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important note: The following list includes all cookies that may be generated based on configured services. The specific cookies installed on your device depend on your consent preferences, active services, and your browser configuration.

own_cookies.title: Our own cookies:
items: cookieConsent: Stores whether you have accepted cookie usage (1 year)
cookiePreferences: Saves your specific preferences by cookie category (1 year)
cookieConsentDate: Date when you gave your consent for cookies (1 year)

third_party_cookies.title: Third-party cookies - Google Tag Manager:
third_party_cookies.note: The following cookies are only generated if the corresponding tags are active in GTM:
items: _ga: Main Google Analytics cookie (2 years)
_ga_[ID]: Google Analytics 4 cookie (2 years)
_gid: Google Analytics cookie (24 hours)
_fbp: Facebook Pixel cookie (90 days)
_ttp: TikTok Pixel cookie (13 months)

firebase_stripe.title: Firebase and Stripe cookies:
items: firebase-heartbeat-store: Connection with Firebase
__stripe_mid: Stripe fraud detection (1 year)
__stripe_sid: Stripe session (30 minutes)

cookie_management.title: Cookie management
cookie_management.description: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
ways: Through our cookie banner when visiting the site
By configuring your browser to block or delete cookies

browser_settings.title: Browser settings:
browsers: Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and security ‚Üí Cookies
Firefox: Options ‚Üí Privacy and security ‚Üí Cookies
Edge: Settings ‚Üí Cookies and site permissions

retention_time.title: Retention time:
items: Session cookies: Deleted when closing the browser
Temporary cookies: Between 30 minutes and 24 hours
Analytics cookies: Up to 2 years (Google Analytics)
Preference cookies: 1 year
Authentication cookies: Up to 2 years

how_to_delete.title: How to delete all cookies:
items: From our site: Revoke your consent in the cookie banner
From your browser: Delete specific cookies from "chatsalsa.com"
Incognito mode: Cookies are automatically deleted when closing
Automatic settings: Configure your browser to delete cookies on exit

updates_contact.title: Updates and contact
updates_contact.updates_description: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes.
updates_contact.contact_description: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please

consent_section.title: Cookie Consent
consent_section.description: By continuing to use our website, you accept the use of cookies as described in this policy.
